about_the_game:
You're trapped in an infinite furniture store, trying to survive against the mutant staff who attack at night. You must explore the store, alone or with your friends, to find a way out. Luckily, it’s filled with furniture that can be used to craft weapons or build fortifications to survive the night.
Eventually you’ll wander too deep into the store and attract something dangerous. The Managers.


You’re stuck in an infinite furniture store. Mind your surroundings or you’ll get lost.


Everything in the store is destructible. You can move the furniture to make a base, or break it apart into resources for crafting.

Meet the staff

The store is guarded by the staff and other creatures. They’re all dangerous in unique ways.


The Managers are a force to be reckoned with. Nothing will stop them if they want you gone.


Most of the staff patrol the show floor. They’re less aggressive during the day.


The staff don't take kindly to seeing their furniture being destroyed.


The Kids department isn’t safe. The Biters hunt in packs.


Keep an eye on the mannequins.


The TV Golems patrol the warehouses. Don't let them spot you.

Survival


You’ll need food to survive. It’s not clear where the cafeteria food comes from.


Building a base is vital. It's better to sleep at night and explore in the day.


Building on top of the shelves in the warehouses can be a good way to stay hidden.


The game features online CO OP. You and your friends can survive together.

Defend yourself


The flamethrower can clear a lot of furniture, but watch out, the fire might spread.


Some things won't feel pain.


You can find a chainsaw in the gardening department. It makes quick work of wooden furniture.


The chainsaw is a powerful but loud weapon.


If you’re cornered, the sledgehammer can create an escape route.

Progression


Craft new weapons from objects found in the store.


You’ll build more elaborate bases as time goes on.


Shopping carts are handy but can also be deadly.

Exploration


Strange departments float above the show floor. Build towers to gain access to them.


If you’re unlucky you might find your way into one of the pocket dimensions connected to the store, such as the backrooms.

The SCP Foundation

An organisation called the SCP Foundation is studying the store. Infiltrate and explore their underground labs. There you’ll find more advanced weapons, crafting materials and secrets about the store.


You’ll need to find an SCP keycard first to enter their labs.


The laboratories are crawling with security.


The SCP Organisation experiment on the staff.


The labs contain other anomalies. Turn off the power to let them loose.


Read the research done by the Foundation on the staff and store.

name: The Store is Closed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: The Store is Closed is a coop survival game set in an infinite furniture store. When the lights go out, the staff attack. You’ll need to craft weapons, and build fortifications to survive the night. Explore the underground SCP laboratories and build towers to the sky to find a way out.
